message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $175. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very useful. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but $175 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $120 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $120 is just too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $150, which is still a great value considering what you'll get from this product. Let's make this work!
I appreciate your flexibility, but $150 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $130 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
